text: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti pe vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ
edit: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti pe vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ

translations.transtext: (Monks, a monk in this [religion] cultivates) the dhamma-investigation-factor, the perseverance-factor, the rapture-factor, the tranquility-factor, the concentration-factor, [and] the equanimity-factor of enlightenment, by means of seclusion, dispassionateness, [and] cessasion, resulting in relinquishment.
